sqlMap.include: id, account, password, operator_create, operator_modify, datetime_create, datetime_modify

sys_admin.id, sys_admin.account, sys_admin.password, sys_admin.operator_create, sys_admin.operator_modify, sys_admin.datetime_create, sys_admin.datetime_modify,
group_concat(sys_admin_role.role_id) as role_ids, group_concat(sys_role.code) as role_codes, group_concat(sys_role.name) as role_names,
(select group_concat(sys_role_permission.permission_id) as role_permission_ids from sys_role_permission where sys_role_permission.role_id = sys_role.id) role_permission_ids
where 1=1 and sys_admin.id=:id and sys_admin.account=:account and sys_admin.password=:password

where 1=1 and id=:id and account like '%' :account '%' and password=:password and operator_create=:operatorCreate and operator_modify=:operatorModify and datetime_create <= date_add(:datetimeCreate, INTERVAL 1 day) and datetime_modify=:datetimeModify
sqlMap.select:
select
from sys_admin
order by datetime_create desc limit queryBegin=:queryBegin,queryCount=:queryCount
select ceil(count(1)/queryCount=:queryCount) as pageCount from sys_admin

select
from sys_admin left join sys_admin_role on sys_admin.id = sys_admin_role.admin_id left join sys_role on sys_role.id = sys_admin_role.role_id
group by sys_admin.id
